findings.title: State variables that could be declared constant (constable-states)
findings.description: Add the `constant` attributes to state variables that never change

findings.title: Unused return values
findings.description: Ensure that all the return values of the function calls are used and handle both success and failure cases if needed by the business logic

findings.title: Ownership can get back by previous owner
findings.description: If owner transfer/renounce ownership after locking ownership the previous owner is still set Prevent previous owner to getting back ownership after transfer/renouncing

findings.title: Wrong comment
findings.description: There are instances of commented out code in the contract that should be removed.
